summary: When an accident renders her fiancé a quadriplegic, Carrie faces mounting pressures that ultimately cause her to start a new life in New York.
cast: Michelle Trachtenberg|Sean Maher|Will Estes|Kristin Fairlie|Dylan Taylor|Matthew Edison|Janet Land|Diana Reis|Corey Turner|John Dartt|Tara Doyle|John Beale|Susie Counsel|David Christoffel|Douglas Robertson|Raquel Duffy|Jeremy Akerman|Marcia Bennett|Matt McGuire|Carrie Neville|Glen Grant|Rhonda McLean|Elvira Gonnella
title: Saliendo a flote
